maha parimanayen kagena yanulabana thawamath nathara wi nomathi wilpaththu sanharaya pilibandawa chodana laba sitina wanija ha karmantha katayuthu amathya rishad baduyudin siya amathyanshaye sitina sinhala sewakayin siyaludenama pahe me wanawita amathyanshaye pahalama mahale siya rajakari katayuthu arambaana lesata niyogayak nikuth kota tibenawa.

yesus wahanseta bawthisma wimata awashyathawayak thibune natha - maknisada yohange bawthismaya, owunge paw wenuwen pasuthawili wunawu aya sandahaya sahadanuwathwa ho nodanuwathwa yesus wahanse kisiwitaka paw kota natha, yesus wahanse upanne shuddhawamaya.

-ape daruwo dakinne napuru hinayak !.ee napuru hinaya ek ek deshapalana kona walin kamara gatha wela ape daruwange anagathaya penawa.ee hinaya thulin gini dal mawenawa 1989 daruwan 2015 wana wita awurudu wisi hayaka daruwan bawata pathwela.me ayata sunila diya daharak ,sihila dena wassaka soduru adaharayak wenna ona me makabaslata oona kamak naha.
digatama awith yanna enna...
eeka me wayase hati..

udaharanayak lesa shi්ra lanka waidya sabhawe nilayan 4k ho 5k amathiwaraya pathkarana athara anekuth niyojithayan waidya wruththikayange chandayen pathwanawa.
ee ayata anuwa yatharthaya kiyanne thamange sanjanana kshethrayata hasuwana de witharayi kiyalayi.
onna yaluwane me para oyalata thawath supiri sinama sithuwamak sinhala upasirasith ekkama aragena aawa.
habayi me dekama ekak!

ee shri lankawa saha indiyawa atharaya.

kohomada ek ayeku pamanak kulmath kala haki? 4:12 miniseku ek jaya haki nam, dekak ohu oroththu haka, saha thun gunayakin lanuwa amaruwen kadi atha. 4:13 wada honda pirimi lamayek, duppath, sihi nuwana athi, raja wada, parani saha moda, karana anagatha paramparawe wenuwen idiriyata balimata danne naha. 4:14 samahara wita sandaha, ek bandhanagara ha mala nikmena, rajyayak sandaha, athara, thawath, rajya balaya upatha, awashyathawa aaharayata. 4:15 mama ira yata gaman karana siyalu jiwana dutu, mama eelanga paramparawa dutu, owunge sthana nagi ya. 4:16 jana sankhyawa, mema pera pawathi siyalu pitathata, asimitha we.

me polonnarawe thibena ewan pauranika sthana kihipayak ganayi.

ada ude enakota magadi bokak set wuna mamath allagena idala aawa pitakotuwata awilla ara aluthen aarakshaka amathanshayen hadala thiyena toyilat thiyen ne ekakata giya aparade kiyanna ba un eka hodata klin karala thiyagannawa .eekata gihilla bokath dala wosh karagena aawa menna tika welawayi giye puka danawa marawidiyata mata passe thamayi mitar wune toyilat eke baldiyata bichin dala eka sudda karana apathaya mage puke palu gihillada manda?thattamath ekka danawa idagena innawath ba choka ge patiya gawenakota elowa pol penawa mekata moko karanne ban behethak wath nadda poddak gala balanna.

lada paminillakata anuwa madaperadiga rataka sita pasugiyada (25) katunayaka guwanthotupolata pamini guwan magiyekuta ayath wideshiya mudal saha watina depola thibu gaman mallak guwanthotupala (bagej belt) asaladi nathiwima sambandhayen guwanthotupala aarakshitha kamara nirikshanaya kara eya ragena giya pudgalaya soya ganimata katayuthu kara athi bawa guwanthotupala polisiye sthanadhipathi pradhana polis parikshaka dabliw.ee.jayanath wanasinha pawasa sitiya.

wayas anuwa mulu janagahanaya prathishathathmaka lesa bedi gos aththe 15 ta adu lamayin 19.87% lesath, 15 - 29 athara wayase pasuwannan 24.71% lesath, 30-59th athara wayase sitinnan 39.67% lesa ha 60ta wadi mahalu janagahanaya 15.74% lesath ya.

me sandaha palamu wa jathyanthara sanwardhanaya sandaha wana opek aramudala samanga naya giwisumakata elambaima sandaha mudal ha ka්ramasampadana amathyawaraya washayen athigaru janadhipathithuma wisin idiripath karana lada yojanawata amathya mandala anumathiya labina. 2015 dayata kirula jathika sanwardhana wadasatahana rajaya wisin upaya margikawa ha ilakkagatha salasum yatathe pa්radeshiya mattamin ka්riyathmaka karanu labana sanwardhana karyayan janathawa wetha pulul lesa samipa kirima sandaha jathika nidahas uthsawayata samagamiwa diwayine distha්rikka kihipayaka dayata kirula wadasatahana ka්riyathmaka kara thibe.
ee nisa anthawadiyada muslim bathimatha da wenkara ganimata ira anda dimata me hondama welawaya.
naththan amathaka welawath'da ??
agamathi ha parlimenthuwa pawathina awasthawakadi widhayaka janadhipathi ka්ramaya ahosikota janadhipathiwaraya parli menthuwen thorapath karaganena adahasak idiripathwa thibe.
eyin ohuge manasika mattama ithamath hondin penwayi.
